title: Penny Projects
overview: A non-profit organisation located in Zambia, Africa, that raises funds for humanitarian work in the local community.
coverImageAlt: People gathering water at a well with organization logo
demoVideoAlt: A short video demonstration of the Penny Project website landing section

design.description1: The site's design was developed through collaboration between a graphic designer and myself, focusing on simplicity, ease of navigation, strong brand identity, and highlighting the organization's impact through compelling content and beneficiary stories.

development.description1: Built with Nuxt3, the site leverages a hybrid SSR/SPA architecture to optimize SEO, load times, and client-side performance. Lots of attention was given to faithfully implementing the designer's vision, ensuring responsive functionality across all devices.

title: Upbranched
overview: A lightweight social media platform built for independent communities, allowing users to create and join 'branches' which are collections of user-moderated groups.
coverImageAlt: User posts on UpBranched platform homepage
demoVideoAlt: A short video demonstration of the Penny Project website landing section

design.description1: Inspired by Reddit, I aimed to create a visually appealing and user-friendly site with enhanced customisation options to allow users to create and maintain their own communities.
design.description2: Leveraging Nuxt3, I developed a fast, responsive, maintainable site that combines SSR and SPA for optimal performance and SEO. Vite, Vue3, TypeScript, and Sass were used for a modern and efficient development workflow.

development.description1: To handle the structured data required for a social media platform, I utilized PostgreSQL. All queries are executed using plain SQL, with thorough validation and sanitization of user-submitted content to prevent SQL injection.
development.description2: To maintain a healthy community, I integrated Google's 'Perspective' API for comment moderation. The site also features Auth0 integration with Google, GitHub, and Discord, a image uploader and compressor using sharp, and an imgur web-scraper for cross-posting content and optimising data storage.

title: Pain Coach
overview: A pain and lifestyle tracking app for post-operative patients that allows users to log their pain levels, activities, and other lifestyle factors to help reduce their overall pain.
coverImageAlt: Pain Coach app dashboard with tracking metrics
demoVideoAlt: A short video demonstration of the Penny Project website landing section

design.description1: A graphic designer created mockups of the site under some direction from myself as to how the website should be structured. The site was designed to be simple and easy to navigate, with a clear brand identity and a focus on the content and the stories of the people that the organisation helps

development.description1: The site was built using Nuxt3, as a hybrid of SSR and SPA through initial rendering on the server and then hydration on the client. This means that the site is SEO friendly and loads fast, but also has the performance benefits of a SPA. A lot of work went into implementing design as provided by the graphic designer, and ensuring this was working correctly and responsive across all devices.

title: Galactic Asteroid Miner
overview: A 2D arcade-style game where you control and upgrade a mining ship, collecting rare asteroids as you venture further out in space.
coverImageAlt: Space station orbiting a star in game title screen
demoVideoAlt: A short video demonstration of the Penny Project website landing section
